heroContent.heading: Tech Stack
heroContent.subheading: Here’s an overview of the technologies I use most, what I’m learning now, and what I’ve explored along the way. I focus on building fast, scalable, and intuitive web apps — and choosing the right tools is key.

category.heading: Core Technologies
category.description: My main tools — used regularly and with confidence.

technology.name: Next.js
technology.description: My go-to framework for fast, modern web development.

technology.name: TypeScript
technology.description: Type-safe code helps me build scalable apps and catch bugs early.

technology.name: Tailwind CSS
technology.description: My favorite way to design responsive, consistent, and clean UIs.

technology.name: React
technology.description: The foundation of my frontend work — I use it mostly via Next.js.

technology.name: JavaScript
technology.description: Fluent in vanilla JS — it complements my TypeScript work well.

category.heading: Currently Learning
category.description: Technologies I’m exploring to go full-stack and beyond.

technology.name: Express
technology.description: Learning backend fundamentals by building APIs with Express.

technology.name: MongoDB
technology.description: Experimenting with MongoDB as a flexible NoSQL solution for modern apps.

technology.name: Swift
technology.description: Diving into native iOS development with Swift — my first step into mobile.

category.heading: Also Familiar With
category.description: Technologies I’ve used in university or earlier projects.

technology.name: Java
technology.description: One of my favorite languages — I studied it extensively at university.

technology.name: C++
technology.description: I’ve used C++ for low-level programming and embedded tasks.

technology.name: HTML
technology.description: A solid understanding of HTML is second nature to me.

technology.name: CSS
technology.description: CSS was my entry point into design — it’s still a core part of my toolkit.

technology.name: Angular
technology.description: My first JS framework — a bit complex, but it taught me key patterns.

technology.name: Android Framework
technology.description: Used in academic and personal projects — strengthened my Java skills.
